reviews.review_text: Late night dinner on the Saturday night, we had Linguine Puttanesca thats been lightly tossed with the hotels owners owned Olive oils.. thats just pure virgin oil, and the quantity and quality of the plating were simply outstanding. My wife had the Steak Diane, the sauce is made with red wine and chanterelle.. she said the steak just melted in her mouth. We paired them both with local BC reds. The service was old school style, gracious and friendly. 5* dinner !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Had the pleasure to take advantage of the three course 2022 dine out lunch menu. For $25 per person (pp), we received a three course meal which started with a goat cheese salad appetizer (also had a choice of a chef selection soup   which was coconut chicken that day), a main   three options available salmon, short rib pasta and a vegetarian option which was a portobello mushroom burger   we selected the latter two. Both tasted great; albeit, the pasta was heavy as it was made with a cream sauce. We ended the meal with a slice of decadent chocolate cake. For a $25 pp price tag, it was good value, and worth the trip. Erin was our server, and she was both helpful and friendly. Location is conveniently located in Coal Harbour, and we also lucked out with a mountainous view that day! The restaurant wasn t too busy, so noise was moderate and seating comfortable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us, Lesley and taking the time to write such a glowing review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our Dine Out Lunch Menu. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: We had the excellent opportunity to enjoy  a social drink or a meal, while on vacation in Vancouver British Columbia. The Prime Rib we had on Sunday was delicious, the staff was very helpful and friendly. Please pass on our compliments to the entire restaurant staff. Thanks for everything. Walter and Mireille
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Walter and Mireille, we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your Prime Rib. We hope to see you again soon and we will be sure to pass on your message to the restaurant staff!

reviews.review_text: The restaurant is in the Pinnacle Harbourfront Hotel which is where we stayed. We ate there a couple of times and had drinks. The happy hour prices are a great deal. The food was very good and the service as well. The bartenders made very good drinks and were professional. I would eat/drink here again even if we are not staying at the hotel.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Doug for the 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Good food, a bit more expensive than other restaurants, staff very friendly. Had live music on one of the evening which was nice. Breakfast good again bit more expensive being within a hotel. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating Lee! We look forward to having you again in the future.

reviews.review_text: I have been going for 6 years, staff is amazing, especially Pavel and food is good! One of my favourite dishes in Vancouver is their Chicken mushroom penne with chorizo! Very nice looks out to the north shore!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great review Mark. We looking forward to having you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Super delicious breakfast, we had a massive pancake stack with real Canadian maple syrup and the Cali Eggs Benny with lots of nice veggies added to the plate. Home fries delicious, servers nice and friendly, and the coffee comes zero waste so good for the environment. Pretty nice view of the mountains with some trees in front, patio is nice too. Thanks for a nice breakfast! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Lana for the review and 5-star rating! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your breakfast with us! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Amaazing food! The whole experience from start to finish is great server Deepika Rawat is always so friendly and kind. The food can t get better and the prices are fair for the portion size. Always a great spot to get great food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating Khush! We hope to see you again in the future.

reviews.review_text: Great breakfast buffet.    They seem to have a lot of different packages ... ours included the buffet including  made to order eggs.   Good value when included in the room rate!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re so glad you enjoyed the breakfast buffet, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Bartenders and staff are on point.  Comfortable place to hang out and enjoy.  Good drinks.  Calamari very good.  Try the margaritas.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Billy, we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your Calamari and Margaritas! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Seafood sandwich so delicious. Pairing with house wine enhanced lunch experience. Friendly servers. Priced reasonable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, William for the 5-star rating! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our service.

reviews.review_text: Had a few meals here the food was good service was great. Happy hour wings and deep fried pickles were delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating, Kyla! Were happy to hear you enjoyed dining with us.

reviews.review_text: Pavel went above and beyond each time we had the pleasure of sitting at one of his tables. He is a top notch server and we were very grateful for his service. Also the truffle fries are amazing here! Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the truffle fries as well as the service. See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Ordered room service here and enjoyed it quite a bit! Have some gluten free options as well!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating Justin! We look forward to having you again in the future.

reviews.review_text: We ordered Christmas dinner to go, and it was delicious! The food was all so tasty, especially the stuffing and creamy mashed potatoes. And the dessert was delicious! We appreciated the well-organized pick-up experience and will definitely order for a special family holiday meal in the future. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Kevin for the 5-star rating. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Christmas Dinner To Go and would love to cook for you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Food and service was amazing! I had the pleasure of meeting Max, Adrian, Matthew & Voula while I was staying in the hotel. They were so friendly & yet quick with service. The creme brulee was recommended and definitely the best I ve tasted. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great review! Were so happy you loved the creme brulee. Hope to see you again soon Kami!

reviews.review_text: Nice breakfast buffet. Nice view, excellent service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet.

reviews.review_text: P2B Bistro & Bar Coal Harbour in DT Vancouver has great steak. Service is fantastic. Went there to celebrate a birthday with friends and family. I highly recommend the P2B Bistro & Bar located in the Pinnacle Hotel.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Terry for your 5-star rating! We hope you dine with us again!

reviews.review_text: We were pleasantly surprised by how nice our dinner was. We have often found that hotel restaurants were just an ok place to get something to eat as a convenience. The sockeye salmon was excellent, as was the Thai soup. Our waiters were top notch, too. As it was a warm evening, we opted to sit outside and enjoyed a view of the North Shore. Bonus!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us and for the glowing review, Cliff & Susan! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your dinner on the patio. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: California-style Eggs Benedict was the best I ever tried so far!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Said! Were so glad you enjoyed your meal and hope you dine with us again soon.

reviews.review_text: I can not say enough about this team of servers!! We stayed 3 days and nights and had everything from the delicious breakfast buffet, beautiful dinner ( the share platter and ravioli were BIG hits) to a few cocktails and snacks at the bar. We had consistently fantastic, fun and genuinely caring service at every turn. This was a a special girls trip as our guest of honour has had a tragic year and very much needed to destress. The playful  banter and extra care was especially appreciated! Thanks so much to Pavel, Jessica, Max, Raju and the fabulous James . Go see him for the kick butt pomegranate margarita!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the glowing review, Celisha! Were so happy to hear you and your group enjoyed dining with us and our servers made your experience even more memorable. We hope we can welcome you back soon!

reviews.review_text: Had brunch and dinner here and that was perfect! The view is super cool, food is great and staff is nice!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the view and dining with us. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I loved my experience there. The food was great, there wasnt a packed room so we were able to enjoy the ambiance of the room and chat comfortably.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Served me the best fries and pulled pork sliders Ive had. The wings could be crisper. Strong pours at the bar.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review Quin. Were happy to hear that you enjoyed the fries and pulled pork sliders so much!

reviews.review_text: Due to 5th wave of pandemic restrictions, our previously reserved table of 9 family members for the Christmas Day 3-course dinner had to be changed into 2 separate tables and placed in a private dinning room of P2B bistro and bar. The scrumptious food was also generous servings for all 3 courses and staff from host to server to bartender were very friendly. Posted 2 pictures of the wonderful dessert choices! Highly recommended for Holiday celebration dinners with loved ones!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your holiday dining experience (even with some pandemic alterations). We apricate you dining with us and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: Delicious food, especially deserts. And their life music made my evening, I totally didn t expect that in a week day evening   Large windows make the place very special
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Ordered Xmas turkey to go for Christmas to feed 8 to 10.  Second year I have done this and it was so delicious.   Everyone loved it. Would order again next year  !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Christimas To Go Dinner and look forward to cooking for you again soon.

reviews.review_text: I had an a amazingly tasty Cajun chicken with a half-rack of ribs. The ribs were fall-off-the-bone very similar to the ribs at Baton Rouge. I did find the portion sizes rather small for the price, so I was still hungry at the end. Still, highly recommended, and the servers were very attentive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us and for the 5-star review, Bobson! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your ribs. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: The menu was mostly American fare but this suited us as we are plain eaters. It was not very expensive either. We both had the All Day Breakfast much to the amusement of the waiter. The waiters were all very professional, friendly and attentive. The food was delicious and we were offered refills on our soft drinks. We enjoyed our meals and we revisited the restaurant later in the holiday.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Renee for the 5-star review!

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and great wait staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for 5-star rating, Ronna! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed dining with us. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: What a delightful surprise today. Came across this restaurant in the Pinnacle Hotel in Vancouver. Great food, superb service and a view of the The inner harbour and North Vancouver mountains.

The things that made this place for me were the service and food. Our waiter was very gregarious and accommodating. We had salmon and halibut between myself and my partner and both were excellent. If you want quick service and well priced drinks, go for happy hour between 4-6.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Joey for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: very nice hotel good food and rooms are large
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ian for the 5-star rating! We look forward to having you again in the future.

reviews.review_text: Service is impeccable! We came late for the buffet and they brought out more food for us. Everything was delicious! Best orange juice ever
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Lizy for the 5-star rating! We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet and orange juice.

reviews.review_text: This place was incredible. It is the restaurant in the beautiful Pinnacle hotel harbourfront. My cousin was staying here and mentioned it after we had been shopping and looking for somewhere to have a bite and catch up on life. They have  happy hour all day so we decided to get a few side dishes and share. Probly best idea ever. They make a homemade potatoe chip fry with a garlic mayo dip that will send your taste buds to heaven.  Ceasars salad is one of my favorites and this place didnt disappoint. The best Ceasars salad I have ever had. The service was great. The only problem was the food was so good that we didnt catch up on life we just devoured all the food. Its one of those places that you wouldnt come across unless you were staying there. I will be back with more friends to show off this hidden gem
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Ricky for the glowing review! We look forward to you dining with us again soon!

reviews.review_text: Awesome breakfast stayed at the pinnacle hotel Harbourfront with my wifes 60th
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us and rating us 5-stars! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: Had a couple wonderful brunches at this place. The waiter Pavel is awesome; he remembered I liked the omelette and managed it even though breakfast had technically ended. Solid 5 stars!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us and for the glowing review, Taylor! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoy our brunches. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favorite places to get dinner and drinks! The service was great (everyone was very nice), and the food was so delicious. I hope to go back soon. Some items are a bit pricey, but its worth the little splurge for their dinner meals and cocktails :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Sarra for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Myself and two of my colleagues stayed at the Pinnacle for three days for a girls retreat and visited P2B on three occasions. We had the pleasure of having Lulzim as our waiter each time. He went above and beyond each time to make sure we were well taken care of. The service and food was absolutely outstanding !!   We would highly recommend this Restaurant & bar to everyone who is visiting downtown Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Susan for the 5-star rating! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: We had the mixed grill platter. 10/10. So good! Thank you for a pleasent dinner. Thank you so much Candice Wonderful service!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us and for the glowing review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our Mixed Grill Plater. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: It was wonderful, food was delicious, people were very helpful with the pickup.  Overall very good as it was last year.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Very good food and great service (thanks Chris C)! Beef short ribs, Apple crumble and chocolate cake were all delicious. Plus some great wine from burrowing owl. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Jay for your 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: staff are lovely and menu is great - daily happy hour is well priced with a good selection and the live music on weekends is wonderful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words and 5-star rating, Kacie! We hope we can welcome you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic experience with really welcoming and friendly staff. The food and drinks were all delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Superb Mothers Day Brunch.  Everything was good and above.  Very tough act to beat.  The best part of the Buffett is the live music.  Most Beautiful voice and gentle music tops the best buffet experience ever.  The sweet music calms all the hungry beasts to gentleman and gentle lady.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, K-Juan for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: I have been to the p2b bistro twice now and both times my meals have been very good. I have enjoyed the view, just wish it would last a bit longer... service is great everyone is very attentive. There is one person in particular that I think deserves extra recognition and he went well beyond his duties. Max (I think hes an assistant waiter? He serves the drinks and food but never takes the orders) on my first visit I could see he was watching over the tables and when he noticed someone needed more water he was quick to respond. But tonight he went the extra mile! I sat down to have my dinner, I had just come down with a cold and was loosing my voice, I ordered a tea, Max delivered my tea and ask how I was? I replied by saying I have a cold. He then proceeded to ask if I would like some honey? I quickly responded yes and shook my head. Shorty he returned with the honey. I then proceeded to try and open the individual honey jar and I was struggling. Max noticed and came right over to me and asked if I needed assistance. He opened the jar! Just then a cold breeze blew past as someone had just opened the door. Max noticed I got a little shiver and asked if I would like a blanket to keep me warm and I said yes. Shorty he returned with an airline blanket! Even the lady that was sitting a few tables down from me noticed how he went above and beyond! His service and thoughtfulness is what really made my meal that much more enjoyable! Thank you Max!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Cathleen for the glowing review! We look forward to you dining with us again.

reviews.review_text: We stayed at the Pinnacle Waterfront hotel where this restaurant is located.  We ordered breakfast to go and Pavel was so awesome and he  paid for our daughters breakfast since it was her 10th bday.  On our way out for the day he saw us and came over and wished her a happy bday and engaged in conversation Just a delight !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Elaine for the 5-star rating! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and Pavels exceptional customer service. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: We went to P2B bistro a month ago to celebrate a birthday. We had a Groupon voucher and made  reservation and had a good table. P2B has  set menu for Groupon coupon. They had salads and prawns for appetizers, steak and sea food for the main course and a couple choices for desserts. Two glasses of wine was also included.  The sea food was very nice.  All in all very good value and the service was good. We enjoyed the evening. Definitely a good hospitable place and we would like to come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Subrata for the 5-star rating! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Showed up on a Saturday night with no notice and about 20 people...the staff was great and accommodated us right away. We proceeded to have a fun rowdy and DELICIOUS dinner (seriously their french fries are unbelievable). Will for sure be going here again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Shannon for your 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: We had our very small wedding here I  the private room and our waiter was amazing! The food is incredible as well as the setting and service! I would highly recommend this restaurant for any occasion, from wedding to a date night!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Erica for the 5-star rating! We are happy to hear your enjoyed our private dining room. We hope you dine with us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great 3 courses meal shared with friends. Enjoyed every bite. Very good attentive and friendly  service. Pleasant low key music allowed for good conversations.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Victoria for the review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your meal, service and the music! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Super impressed with the service and quality of food at the P2B. We showed up with a small group that quickly turned into a horde of 21 hungry convention exhibitors, on a Saturday night; essentially the definition of a restaurants nightmare. Not only did the front of house staff accommodate all of us by building us a literal banquet table, but our server Linda killed it! She dealt with all of our drinks, food, more drinks, desserts, bill splits, rinse-repeat for the evening in more than reasonable time, and the meals came out hot and delicious! Thank you P2B!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Laura for your 5-star rating! We hope you visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely delicious food that is reasonably priced and a fantastic ambiance. They also have a really nice patio if you go in the summer. Well worth visiting for just a drink or a full meal.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Radek for the 5-star rating! We are happy you enjoyed our patio and hope you visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: The atmosphere is great, the waiters are at the level, the food is too good!!! A place with every recommendation!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Me and family came from edmonton, first time here. Service was amazing, and food was amazing ad well. All of the staff were very nice and hard working. 100% recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Asmir for the glowing review and 5-star rating! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your meal. We look forward to you dining with us again when youre back in Vancouver.

reviews.review_text: Great food, great service, great live music, wasn t too loud like lots of places.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review! Were happy to hear that you enjoyed.

reviews.review_text: The food was amazing as was the service. The view was beautiful, and the music was great. Has a wonderful selection of exquisite food choices, all fairly priced.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Justin for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Very good food. Smaller portions but we were satisfied.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating, Carolyn! Were happy to hear you enjoyed dining with us.

reviews.review_text: Good staff, good food, and some damn good music on weekends. Somehow the bartender remembered us after a whole year, shoutout to Max!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed dining with us and look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Sukh raj gave us excellence service . She was very nice treatment.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are happy to hear that you had an excellent experience.

reviews.review_text: Music night was amazing! Food was very good and it was a very nice evening. The view is very cool, lots of light.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Henri for the review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your evening, particularly the live music! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Excellent service here and amazing food! Always pleased when we make it out to this beautiful restaurant! The view is stunning!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Kristi for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: View was breathtaking, salmon was everything I hoped fresh-caught Pacific coast salmon would taste like, service was wonderful! What more can be said?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Robin for the 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Excellent service. Incredible attention to detail and exceptional pride in work (bartenders). Exceptional service and incredible cocktails. Was a pleasant surprise!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Cayla for your 5-star rating!

reviews.review_text: Good food and usually very friendly staff. Pavel the waiter is amazing
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Ash for the 5-star rating! We look forward to you dining with us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Shame they dont make barista coffee

reviews.review_text: Very family friendly and baby friendly. Food is good. I like the benedicts on the menu.

reviews.review_text: Attentive waiter, good food quality, reasonable prices. We always eat here at least once when visiting Vancouver.

reviews.review_text: Came here at short notice with the rest of our club and they made it an awesome experience! Amazing food and service!

reviews.review_text: Did a great job accommodating our group of 21 that just randomly showed up on a Saturday night without a reservation!

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed dining with us. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I stayed at the pinnacle and got a complimentary breakfast from P2B I was help by Pavel who is so polite, kind and very professional with his his job.

reviews.review_text: It was so much better than we expected of a hotel restaurant.

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend this establishment.

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and exceptional service
